course_description:
This lab is designed to develop students' musical literacy and creativity through ear training, transcription, writing, arranging, and improvisation exercises. Students will also gain experience with music notation software. Final projects will be read
and recorded by a peer student jazz ensemble.
schedule_location:
MW 2:30pm-3:45pm in Burlington Road Building 107
TTh 4pm-5:15pm in Burlington Road Building 324
